text:
Apache installed with xmapp

When I open the htpasswd.exe, I see it flash then it disappeared, I rebooted and it did run but I was not able to type anything, so I closed it and then was not able to start it at all. It started to flash again and disappearing again.
creator: ctcinv@hushmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text: Bugzilla is for reporting defects in Apache HTTP Server, it seems like you have an installation problem with a third-party build.  You'll have to take it up with xampp or ask for help/support outside of bugzilla.

creator: ctcinv@hushmail.com
text: Would reinstalling just apache possibly resolve the issue?

I assume you mean XAMPP, not XMAPP.

htpasswd.exe is a command-line utility, you don't run it by opening it in explorer, you run it by running a command prompt and calling it from there.
creator: frymaster@127001.org
